    from stl import mesh
from mpl_toolkits import mplot3d
from matplotlib import pyplot as plt

# Create a new plot
figure = pyplot.figure()
axes = mplot3d.Axes3D(figure)

# Load the STL files and add the vectors to the plot
your_mesh = mesh.Mesh.from_file('3D_files/nucleosome.stl')

print(your_mesh)

axes.add_collection3d(mplot3d.art3d.Poly3DCollection(your_mesh.vectors))

# Auto scale to the mesh size
scale = your_mesh.points.flatten()

print(scale)

axes.auto_scale_xyz(scale, scale, scale)

# Show the plot to the screen
plt.show()
    <Mesh: b'' 180940 vertices>
[  0.3895  47.231  -44.9434 ...   1.6962   9.8577 -91.2496]
    <Figure size 640x480 with 0 Axes>

    import vtk

# Load STL file
reader = vtk.vtkSTLReader()
reader.SetFileName("3D_files/nucleosome.stl")
reader.Update()

# Get output data from reader
stl_data = reader.GetOutput()
    # Create mapper
mapper = vtk.vtkPolyDataMapper()
mapper.SetInputData(stl_data)
    # Create actor
actor = vtk.vtkActor()
actor.SetMapper(mapper)
    # Create renderer
renderer = vtk.vtkRenderer()
renderer.AddActor(actor)
renderer.SetBackground(0.1, 0.2, 0.4) # Set background color

# Create window and add renderer
window = vtk.vtkRenderWindow()
window.AddRenderer(renderer)

# Set window size and show window
window.SetSize(800, 600)
window.Render()
window.SetWindowName("STL Viewer")

# Set interactor and start event loop
interactor = vtk.vtkRenderWindowInteractor()
interactor.SetRenderWindow(window)
interactor.Start()
    import vtk

# Load STL file
reader = vtk.vtkSTLReader()
reader.SetFileName("3D_files/nucleosome.stl")
reader.Update()

# Create mapper and actor
mapper = vtk.vtkPolyDataMapper()
mapper.SetInputData(reader.GetOutput())
actor = vtk.vtkActor()
actor.SetMapper(mapper)

# Create renderer and window
renderer = vtk.vtkRenderer()
renderer.AddActor(actor)
renderer.SetBackground(0.1, 0.2, 0.4)
window = vtk.vtkRenderWindow()
window.AddRenderer(renderer)
window.SetSize(800, 600)

# Create window-to-image filter
w2if = vtk.vtkWindowToImageFilter()
w2if.SetInput(window)
w2if.Update()

# Create PNG writer
writer = vtk.vtkPNGWriter()
writer.SetFileName("output.png")
writer.SetInputData(w2if.GetOutput())
writer.Write()
    import vtk

# Load STL file
reader = vtk.vtkSTLReader()
reader.SetFileName("3D_files/nucleosome.stl")
reader.Update()

# Create mapper and actor
mapper = vtk.vtkPolyDataMapper()
mapper.SetInputData(reader.GetOutput())
actor = vtk.vtkActor()
actor.SetMapper(mapper)

# Create renderer and window
renderer = vtk.vtkRenderer()
renderer.AddActor(actor)
renderer.SetBackground(0.1, 0.2, 0.4)
window = vtk.vtkRenderWindow()
window.AddRenderer(renderer)
window.SetSize(800, 600)

# Adjust camera position and focal point
camera = renderer.GetActiveCamera()
bounds = actor.GetBounds()
center = [(bounds[0]+bounds[1])/2, (bounds[2]+bounds[3])/2, (bounds[4]+bounds[5])/2]
distance = max(bounds[1]-bounds[0], bounds[3]-bounds[2], bounds[5]-bounds[4])
camera.SetPosition(center[0], center[1], center[2]+1.5*distance)
camera.SetFocalPoint(center[0], center[1], center[2])

# Create window-to-image filter
w2if = vtk.vtkWindowToImageFilter()
w2if.SetInput(window)
w2if.Update()

# Create PNG writer
writer = vtk.vtkPNGWriter()
writer.SetFileName("output.png")
writer.SetInputData(w2if.GetOutput())
writer.Write()
    import vtk

# Load STL file
reader = vtk.vtkSTLReader()
reader.SetFileName("3D_files/nucleosome.stl")
reader.Update()

# Create mapper and actor
mapper = vtk.vtkPolyDataMapper()
mapper.SetInputData(reader.GetOutput())
actor = vtk.vtkActor()
actor.SetMapper(mapper)

# Set actor color to red
actor.GetProperty().SetColor(1, 0, 0)

# Create renderer and window
renderer = vtk.vtkRenderer()
renderer.AddActor(actor)
renderer.SetBackground(1, 1, 1) # set background color to white
window = vtk.vtkRenderWindow()
window.AddRenderer(renderer)
window.SetSize(800, 600)

# Adjust camera position and focal point
camera = renderer.GetActiveCamera()
bounds = actor.GetBounds()
center = [(bounds[0]+bounds[1])/2, (bounds[2]+bounds[3])/2, (bounds[4]+bounds[5])/2]
distance = max(bounds[1]-bounds[0], bounds[3]-bounds[2], bounds[5]-bounds[4])
camera.SetPosition(center[0], center[1], center[2]+1.5*distance)
camera.SetFocalPoint(center[0], center[1], center[2])

# Create window-to-image filter
w2if = vtk.vtkWindowToImageFilter()
w2if.SetInput(window)
w2if.Update()

# Create PNG writer
writer = vtk.vtkPNGWriter()
writer.SetFileName("output.png")
writer.SetInputData(w2if.GetOutput())
writer.Write()
